meanings.definition: Going beyond what is usual or allowed.
meanings.sent1: The exceeding speed of the car made me nervous.
meanings.sent2: The cake had an exceeding amount of sugar in it.
meanings.sent3: The exceeding number of balloons in the room made it look like a party store.
meanings.sent4: Her exceeding kindness warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The exceeding height of the mountain took our breath away.

meanings.sent1: She was exceeding happy when she received the gift.
meanings.sent2: The music was exceeding loud at the concert.
meanings.sent3: He ate the cake so quickly, exceeding his usual speed.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed exceeding fast after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The sun shone exceeding brightly in the clear sky.

meanings.sent1: The exceeding beauty of the sunset left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: The athlete showed exceeding strength in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The exceeding size of the elephant amazed the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her exceeding talent in painting was recognized worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The exceeding speed of the cheetah was unmatched in the wild.
